title: **Expression of E- and L-selectin-IgM chimeric protein in COS cells**

body.body: Two to three days later, collect culture supernatant .
Concentrate the medium using Centriprep YM-30 or YM-100 for 10 to 50 fold.  The concentration rate is dependent on each experiment. The chimeric proteins can be used without further purification.
Perform SDS polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis of desired materials \(for example, lymph node lysates) and transfer proteins onto Immobilon-P by standard procedure.
Block the blot with 10 mg/ml bovine serum albumin in washing buffer for 30 min.
Incubate the filter with the concentrated culture supernatant containing E/L-selectin-IgM without dilution for 1 hr at 4°C.
Wash three times with washing buffer.  Each wash should be 20 min long.  We usually put ice in an ice basket, place a washing container on the ice and covered the basket with a lid.
Incubate the blot with 10,000 x diluted HRP-anti-human IgM for 1 hr at 4°C.
